content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”We Take Care Of Your Home So You Can Take Care Of Yourself” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]When it comes to fast, energy-efficient, and affordable solutions for treating dirt and mold issues in your home, United Home Services has got you covered.

We offer comprehensive indoor air assessments and treatments that get to the root of the issue for a lasting solution. We believe in resolving the problem at the source rather than applying a bandage over it.

We have more than 20+ years of experience in:

  • Installing home insulation
  • AC installation
  • Chimney cleaning
  • Home duct cleaning 
  • And more!

We helped thousands of homeowners across the country, just like you! With United Home Services as your air quality partner, you can breathe easier and live better! [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”We Are Committed To Your Satisfaction” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]We want you to meet and exceed your expectations in every interaction we have with you—from the initial assessment to post-services follow-up. 

  • We know how to improve the air quality of your home so you breathe fresher, healthier air
  • We know how to eliminate every bit of mildew, mold, and dangerous microbes from your HVAC systems
  • We know how to install home insulation and perform efficient AC home duct cleaning so your family stays safe inside regardless of the harsh weather and elements outside

But most importantly, we know how to enhance your standard of living. We are a one-stop shop for all your home service needs:

  •  Home insulation installation and repair
  •  Chimney sweeping
  • AC installation, repair, and replacement
  • AC home duct cleaning
  • Dryer vent cleaning

Our goal is to do everything we can so you can breathe better and live better, too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”We Specialize in Indoor Air Quality Services” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]It’s crucial that your indoor air quality is at its optimal levels for the health benefits clean air provides you. But also, clean air is important for you to be able to enjoy your home. Don’t let your home be the reason behind worsening allergy symptoms!

United Home Services can help you breathe easier. Our technicians are HIS-licensed and EPA-certified, and they undergo regular training to give your home’s cooling and heating systems the best installation and repair work, including chimney cleaning, home duct cleaning, and dryer vent cleaning.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1523304428299{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”top-row” el_id=”about”][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1523304086727{padding-top: 36px !important;padding-right: 36px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 36px !important;background-color: #f2f2f2 !important;}” el_class=”wh-box-big”][vc_custom_heading text=”United Home Services” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1605276357883{border-left-width: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

For over 20 years, United Home Services remains one of the leading experts in all aspects of Chimney Cleaning and Inspection, Air Duct Cleaning, Dryer Vent Cleaning and Home Insulation. We take great pride in our extreme professionalism, timeliness and excellent customer service on every job

Our lead technicians have over 50 collective years of experience. United Home Services started as a family run small business and now has locations across the country. We take care of our customers so that the next time service is needed there will be no question on who to call. Give us a call today, we are happy to help you with your project and look forward to talking to you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1523304367611{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner el_class=”two-logo-mobile” width=”1/3″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”two-logo-mobile” width=”1/3″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”two-logo-mobile” width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16148″ img_size=”medium”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” gap=”5″ css=”.vc_custom_1522697295014{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”16157″ img_size=”medium”][vc_custom_heading text=”Call to Book an Appointment today!” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%2386c232″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23||”][vc_custom_heading text=”800.399.4248” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:left|color:%2386c232″ google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” link=”url:tel%3A8003994248|||” css=”.vc_custom_1523303798540{margin-bottom: 35px !important;padding-top: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1522697517206{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]

We can provide expert service for all your Air Conditioning, Air Duct, Dryer Vent, Chimney, and Home Insulation needs for your residential and commercial properties!

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Hours” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522696991165{padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Monday- Sunday: 24 hours” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1523303839787{padding-left: 22px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1522607058648{margin-top: 27px !important;}” el_id=”about”][vc_column el_class=”wh-box-big-left” css=”.vc_custom_1477050500992{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-md-8″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1461593412969{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”499″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”left-to-right” css=”.vc_custom_1469904629894{margin-bottom: 23px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1463390140563{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”498″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”left-to-right” css=”.vc_custom_1469904641319{margin-bottom: 23px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1463390059705{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”500″ img_size=”full” onclick=”custom_link” img_link_target=”_blank” css_animation=”left-to-right” css=”.vc_custom_1469904653746{margin-bottom: 23px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]

Our lead technicians have over 50 collective years of experience. United Home Services started as a family run small business and now has locations across the country. We take care of our customers so that the next time service is needed there will be no question on who to call. Give us a call today, we are happy to help you with your project and look forward to talking to you.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Company History” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23||”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1477045662270{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Established in 1991, AirPro Experts  is a family owned business with extensive experience in installation of air-conditioning systems. The company has been successfully completing many complex projects during these 25 years in the industry, what gives us confidence about the professionalism of our employees and the quality of work performed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1461592262718{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Mission” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%23||”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1477045617622{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Our company provides a full spectrum of work of any level of complexity. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals, who have been in the industry for no less than 6 years. We have gained extensive experience while solving the most complex technical and organizational tasks, what allows us to provide you with the best service.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1477043165060{margin-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”crea-primary-background” css=”.vc_custom_1480205038054{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”]

[vc_custom_heading text=”Receive Special Offers” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:36px|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1489343669858{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Sign up to receive our special offers direct to your inbox.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1489343677553{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”Reliable Home Insulation, Chimney Sweep, AC Repair and Duct Cleaning Services in Connecticut, Maryland, Texas, Washington, and Pennsylvania” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left”][vc_column_text]We have been around long enough to know that carrying dependable, quality equipment is only the first step. We have succeeded largely because we understand the importance of excellent customer service.

    We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee as well as a total replacement guarantee protection to customers who are unhappy with the job we do. We also offer a 10-year labor warranty on new AC installations, so you can rest assured that you have nothing to lose in case of a malfunction.

    Want to learn more about what we can do as part of your home HVAC, chimney, home insulation, and other services? Call us at 866-847-7454 or leave us a message online, and we will get back to you promptly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
